# Setup

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(MerfishData)
library(ExperimentHub)
```

# Data retrieval

```{r ehub}
eh <- ExperimentHub()
query(eh, c("MerfishData", "ileum"))
```

```{r spe-ileum, message = FALSE}
spe <- MerfishData::MouseIleumPetukhov2021(segmentation = "baysor",
                                           use.images = FALSE,
                                           use.polygons = FALSE)
spe
```
